parameters.name: CenId
parameters.description: The ID of the CEN instance.

parameters.name: ChildInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the network instance that is attached to the CEN instance.

parameters.name: ChildInstanceRegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the network instance.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ChildInstanceType
parameters.description:
The type of the network instance. Valid values:

*   **VPC**: virtual private cloud (VPC)
*   **VBR**: virtual border router (VBR)
*   **CCN**: Cloud Connect Network (CCN) instance
